seo.title: Stable Management Software & Invoicing
seo.description: Manage your stable, finally simple and automated. Auto invoicing, horse tracking, owner communication. Create your stable for free.
seo.keywords: stable software, equestrian management, stable invoicing, horse health record, riding center software, rider app, horse breeding

hero.subtitle: Invoicing, horse tracking, owner communication. Save time for what matters most: <1>your horses</1>.

pain_points.title: You deserve better than Excel and loose papers

invoices.title: No more late invoices
invoices.text: Stop chasing payments. Everything is automated to secure your cash flow.

sms.title: No more lost messages
sms.text: Centralize all care and work requests. Nothing slips through the cracks.

paperwork.title: No more paperwork
paperwork.text: Registers, VAT... Equinox handles compliance for you.

features.label: KEY FEATURES
features.main_title: Everything to manage your stable serenely

billing.title: Automatic Invoicing
billing.subtitle: Generate your board invoices in 1 click. Integrated card payment.
billing.desc: Configure your recurring board fees and let Equinox do the rest. Your owners receive their invoice by email and can pay instantly online.
billing.commission: * Transparent commission on online payments: 2.5% + 0.25â‚¬ per transaction.

health.title: Digital Health Record
health.subtitle: Your horses' entire history in your pocket.
health.desc: Always know where vaccine boosters, dewormers, and farriery stand. Share the health record with the owner or vet in an instant.

messaging.title: Dedicated Messaging
messaging.subtitle: Keep in touch with your owners and team.
messaging.desc: Separate pro from personal. Chat by horse or by topic. Send photos and videos directly from the stable.

footer.tagline:

Hello {{name}},

You have been invited to join the Equinox team.
Here is your access code: {{code}}

Download the app here: https://equinox-app.com

See you soon on Equinox!

support_page.title: Customer Support
support_page.bot_welcome:
Hello! I am the Equinox virtual assistant. How can I help you today?

1. Technical question
2. Question about my subscription
3. Report a bug
4. Other

bot.default_response: I understand. Could you please provide more details?
bot.technical: For technical issues, try refreshing the page (F5) first. If the problem persists, clear your browser cache. Did that help?
bot.subscription: You can manage your subscription directly in Settings > My Subscription. You will find your invoices and upgrade options there.
bot.bug: Sorry for the inconvenience. Can you describe exactly what is happening? A screenshot (which you can send by email) would greatly help our teams.
bot.contact: Sure. You can contact our technical support directly by email by clicking the button below.
bot.thanks: Glad I could help! Feel free if you have any other questions.

mail.subject: Equinox Support - Assistance Request
mail.body:
Hello,

I am encountering an issue: 

[Describe your issue here]

Best regards,
